description:
info_cache updates can occur at the same time an instance is being deleted... causing None to be returned from the info_cache_update DB API call vs the new info_cache data...  This causes a traceback to be logged when trying to update nova-cells.

The fix should be similar to this:

http://paste.openstack.org/show/38221/
title: Races in info cache updates cause traceback w/ cells

comments.content:
info_cache updates can occur at the same time an instance is being deleted... causing None to be returned from the info_cache_update DB API call vs the new info_cache data...  This causes a traceback to be logged when trying to update nova-cells.

The fix should be similar to this:

http://paste.openstack.org/show/38221/
